full_text: Page 1317 Media inquiry - Fox News - re: former AW Shirley Skipper Scott & case manager D. Mebane From (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) To (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) Date 2019/11/14 16:21 Subject: Media inquiry - Fox News - re: former AW Shirley Skipper Scott & case manage (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) Attachments: TEXT.htm, IMAGE.gif, IMAGE.gif, IMAGE.gif, IMAGE.gif, IMAGE.gif, IMAGE.gif, IMAGE.gif, IMAGE.gif (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) For sake of speed, (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) and I decided for me to pass along to you quickly this very rough draft for the second inquiry pertaining to MCC NY below for you to review and edit as needed and send back to (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) or (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) (just like the last email and (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) will get back to me). To be sure I'm clear, as background do you know if AW Skipper Scott & case manage (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) were working at MCC NY before Epstein's death or anything the reporter might be wondering about them (feel free to not answer if part of the Epstein investigation, I'm ignorant of names involved): Question from Fox News: Hi there can you confirm whether case manage (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) is still working with SHU inmates at MCC or has he been transferred to a different caseload, unit or facility after Jeffrey Epstein death? Also can you confirm the status of Assistant Warden Shirley Skipper Scott? (b)(5) (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) (b)(5) Here are 3 recent answers we sent to media asking questions related to Epstein: We decline to comment as the Epstein case is currently under investigation by the Federal Bureau of Investigation and Department of Justice's Office of Inspector General. text_blocks.content: Media inquiry - Fox News - re: former AW Shirley Skipper Scott & case manager D. Mebane

From (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) To (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) Date 2019/11/14 16:21 Subject: Media inquiry - Fox News - re: former AW Shirley Skipper Scott & case manage (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) Attachments: TEXT.htm, IMAGE.gif, IMAGE.gif, IMAGE.gif, IMAGE.gif, IMAGE.gif, IMAGE.gif, IMAGE.gif, IMAGE.gif

For sake of speed, (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) and I decided for me to pass along to you quickly this very rough draft for the second inquiry pertaining to MCC NY below for you to review and edit as needed and send back to (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) or (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) (just like the last email and (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) will get back to me). To be sure I'm clear, as background do you know if AW Skipper Scott & case manage (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) were working at MCC NY before Epstein's death or anything the reporter might be wondering about them (feel free to not answer if part of the Epstein investigation, I'm ignorant of names involved):

Question from Fox News: Hi there can you confirm whether case manage (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) is still working with SHU inmates at MCC or has he been transferred to a different caseload, unit or facility after Jeffrey Epstein death? Also can you confirm the status of Assistant Warden Shirley Skipper Scott?

Here are 3 recent answers we sent to media asking questions related to Epstein: We decline to comment as the Epstein case is currently under investigation by the Federal Bureau of Investigation and Department of Justice's Office of Inspector General.
The Epstein case is currently under investigation by the Federal Bureau of Investigation and

organizations: Department of Justice's Office of Inspector General

additional_notes: The document contains redactions marked as (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) and (b)(5), indicating sensitive information has been removed. The document appears to be a media inquiry response related to Jeffrey Epstein's case.
